description: Tenders are invited for the supply of Suspenders, Trousers to the Department of National Defence. The requirement is detailed in Annex A. Suppliers must submit their bids to the contract address by the date and time specified. Bids received after this time may not be considered for evaluation. \\n\\nThis contract is for \\ninterpretation: purchase of 15,600 pairs of Suspenders, Trousers.\\n\\nThe contract is for an initial minimum period of 36 months.\\n\\nAll enquiries regarding this tender opportunity should be sent to Annex A, directed to \\n.\\n\\n\t and must be made in writing.\\n\\n\\\n\\n

full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
=========================

*   **Title (English/French)**: Suspenders, Trousers / Bretelles, Pantalons
*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012461
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8486-228228/A
*   **Publication Date**: November 3, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 2, 2023, 2:00:00 PM
*   **Amendment Date**: January 24, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
*   **Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired / Expiré

**Notice Details**
----------------

*   **GSin Code**: N8440
*   **Category Description (English/French)**: Hosiery, Handwear and Clothing Accessories, Men's / Bonneterie, ganterie et accessoires vestimentaires pour hommes
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (exluding NCR)

**Contact Information**
--------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Name (English/French)**: Department of National Defence / Ministère de la défense nationale
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2
*   **Contact Information**: Michelle Brassard, michelle.brassard@forces.gc.ca
*   **Contact Fax**: Not Specified

**Tender Directions**
-------------------

*   Interested suppliers should submit proposals in writing to the Contracting Authority.
*   All Enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date.
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments**
--------------

Supporting documents for the tender are available at the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/462546cfd5cbfd9b696f09e5cbc94
